name: TabletopCharacterSheet
0:
”Alexa open Tabletop Character Sheet”
”Roll a Strength saving throw”
”Describe my character”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tabletop character sheet
des:
Use Alexa to track your Ability Scores, Proficiencies, Expertise, and perform rolls with those scores included. 

The app currently only tracks one character per account, and is initialized to having all ability scores set to 10, at level 1, with no proficiencies or expertise. Tell Alexa the actual values to store them and properly calculate the rolls as your character develops. Coming Soon:
Multiple characters per account
Additional character info
Inventory Management
Tool Proficiencies
Jack-of-all-trades and similar bonuses
Generic roller
Inventory Management

Usage of this app falls under Wizards of the Coast's Fan Content Policy: http://company.wizards.com/fancontentpolicy
